short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: True full screen mode for Google applications - slides, sheets, documents, meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
True full screen mode for Google applications - edit and show comments in a true full screen mode. Utilize the full potential of your screen size.

Supported applications: 
- GoogleSlides
- GoogleSheets
- GoogleDocumments

Future plans:
- GoogleMeet

Tested on operations system:
- Windows
- Linux
- Mac

Tested with following web browsers:
Chrome
Edge
